title: Trailer Hitch Installation: CURT 12130 on Mercury Grand Marquis
description:
This video depicts the installation of the CURT 12130 Class 2 trailer hitch on a 1997 Mercury Grand Marquis. 

Install Sheet - 
https://www.curtmfg.com/masterlibrary/121300/installsheet/CM_121300_INS.PDF

Application Coverage:
1979 - 2011 Ford Crown Victoria LTD
1979 - 1991 Ford Country Squire LTD
1980 - 2011 Lincoln Town Car
1980 - 1983 Lincoln Mark VI
2003 - 2004 Mercury Marauder 
1983 - 2009 Mercury Grand Marquis Sedan
1979 - 1982 Mercury Grand Marquis Wagon
1979 - 1987 Mercury Colony Park Wagon


Special Notes:
***DO NOT EXCEED VEHICLE MANUFACTURER'S RECOMMENDED TOWING CAPACITY***
PERIODICALLY CHECK THIS RECEIVER HITCH TO ENSURE THAT ALL FASTENERS
ARE TIGHT AND THAT ALL STRUCTURAL COMPONENTS ARE SOUND.

Warning:
-This video is intended to be used as reference. Please refer to print instructions for complete installation information.
tags: CURT Receiver Hitch, trailer hitch, towing, how to install, Mercury Grand Marquis, Ford Crown Victoria, Lincoln Town Car
